rationale: The instructions clearly state to skip the dose if remembered the next day, satisfying the criterion fully.
There is no mention of practical strategies to improve medication adherence, such as setting reminders or placing medication visibly.
The patient's concern about missing doses and its impact on her progress is not documented.
There is no mention of addressing the patient's concern about managing medication adherence amidst personal responsibilities.
There is no follow-up plan or further assessment of the patient's major depressive disorder documented.
